items.sentence: Tom bought a new dishwasher and told Mary that it was her Valentine's Day gift.

Many people buy lottery tickets with the dream of immediately becoming wealthy.

Just because you've never heard that word before doesn't mean it doesn't exist.

If you don't want to get married, it would be better if you didn't get married.
